subject: Baseball
World Series
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Albert Pujols became only the third player to hit three home runs in a World Series game, helping the Cardinals emerge with a victory over the Rangers to take a one-game lead in the World Series.
snippet: Albert Pujols became only the third player to hit three home runs in a World Series game, helping the Cardinals emerge with a victory over the Rangers to take a one-game lead in the World Series.
